attributes.action: Issue women with a rape alarm and free self defence classes.
attributes.additional_details: The current issue around is that women are not safe on the streets, we are obviously not allowed things to use but we can protect ourselves and alert others, I feel that the government could provide women with a rape alarm and if wanted a free self defence class, we need to divert any attacker away and inform others in the area there is a threat, I really feel this is a necessity and would  encourage the government to really take this into consideration. We should all feel safe
attributes.background: I would like the government to issue all women a rape alarm and or free self defence classes,

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund free rape alarms for all: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578966

Fund free self-defence classes for women in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578919
